title: 2025 Chilean general election - Wikipedia
snippet: Michelle Bachelet (Socialist Party), former president of Chile (2006–2010, 2014–2018), announced on 5 March 2025 that she would not run for a third term, stating that "good politics demands renewal." Her decision ended months of speculation within the ruling coalition.

title: Ultra-conservative José Antonio Kast elected Chile’s next president | Chile | The Guardian
snippet: Sun 14 Dec 2025 18.40 ESTLast modified on Tue 16 Dec 2025 00.08 EST · Share · The ultra-conservative former congressman José Antonio Kast has been elected as Chile’s next president.

title: Chile shifts sharply right as José Antonio Kast wins the presidency
snippet: Presidential candidate Jose Antonio Kast, of the Republican Party, waves after winning the presidential runoff election in Santiago, Chile, Sunday, Dec. 14, 2025.
